channel.title: Pawng. Teh simpal game
channel.description:
I wrote a game of pong today. Yea..
[img]http://img162.imageshack.us/img162/7356/pawng.jpg[/img]
Since i was superior in brainpower compared to everyone else that attempted the game. I hold the awesomeness record. [img]http://img162.imageshack.us/img162/930/pawnhax.png[/img]
A new ball is added every 20-30 seconds.
I guess you can have fun, or lick your computer monitor. I really dont care :)

item.title: Pawng. Teh simpal game
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“TeleNubby, post:5, topic:265296”][quote author=Frell link=topic=350246.msg2691139#msg2691139 date=1235963402]
I’ve also noticed that if the ball hits the section of the wall behind the paddle it bounces
[/quote]Obviously, that means your collision check only involes the y coordinate of the paddle. Add in the x coordinate as well.

Wait… how does the ball get to the section of the wall behind the paddle?[/quote]

When your in a corner it sometimes does

Read full topic

item.title: Pawng. Teh simpal game
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:4, topic:265296”]I’ve also noticed that if the ball hits the section of the wall behind the paddle it bounces[/quote]Obviously, that means your collision check only involes the y coordinate of the paddle. Add in the x coordinate as well.

Wait… how does the ball get to the section of the wall behind the paddle?

Read full topic

item.title: Pawng. Teh simpal game
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

nueb35:

there are some problems, i didnt see the first ball until the ball count was 2, and the balls sometimes dont bounce off the paddle, it just slides down and becomes a miss >.> other than that, its good, also if its 1 ball every 20-30 secs howed you get to 891? :0 i would assume you made it like 1 second or something?

Yea I made it every second in the second pic

I didn’t notice the ballcount messing up and I had a hard time getting the ball to bounce off the paddle

I’ll revise the src tomorrow and see if I can rewrite collision. I’ve also noticed that if the ball hits the section of the wall behind the paddle it bounces

Read full topic
